revised_title: Thermal Conductivity of Nickel: Spin-Lattice Coupling Constants and Anomalies
tldr: This article investigates the thermal conductivity of nickel and analyzes the results to determine the average spin-lattice coupling constants. The authors find that these constants are in agreement with values calculated using magneto-elastic constants from acoustic paramagnetic resonance experiments. They also discuss possible causes for anomalies in the thermal resistivity, concluding that they result from phonon interactions with exchange-coupled pairs of ions.
